E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 7/10/1990
Subject: Progress of John Wehner
Dear Sir,
John Wehner has nothing more to prove at AA Orlando Sun Rays!
He has an AVG of .277 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 7/10/1990
Subject: Progress of Reggie Harris
Dear Sir,
Reggie Harris has nothing more to prove at AA Orlando Sun Rays!
He has an ERA of 3.80 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 8/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Matt Walbeck
Dear Sir,
Matt Walbeck is hitting the ball well at AA Orlando Sun Rays!
He has an AVG of .276, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 8/11/1990
Subject: John Sutton healing process
John Sutton is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

to promote him soon!

Regards,
